trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Port Richey
There were no other sightings in Port Richey on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to watch my nieghbors setting off fireworks and saw a slow moving object about two miles in sky moving south to north above the Gulf of Mexico. It looked like a cluster of red and yellow stars but appeared to be one object with many parts in the general shape of a ball. I am an amature astronomer so I know it was not a star and it was not any type of commercial fireworks as we have none in our town. Too high to be any homemade fireworks. It just moved slowly and up and down for four or five minutes then was gone.
